title: McLaren F1 team taken over by Bahrain and Abu Dhabi wealth funds
summary: McLaren Racing has been valued at up to $5 billion as Bahrain's Mumtalakat and Abu Dhabi's CYVN Holdings take full control

qa_pairs.question: Which two wealth funds have taken full control of McLaren Racing?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Bahrain's Mumtalakat and Abu Dhabi's CYVN Holdings
wrong_options: Saudi Arabia's PIF and Qatar Investment Authority
Kuwait Investment Authority and Oman's State General Reserve Fund

qa_pairs.question: What is the estimated valuation of McLaren Racing following the takeover?
What type of organization is McLaren Racing?
